story.text: Here I will try and keep track of the errors that are encountered.

* While looking at an issue with the WikiGenesis plugin, used to create a new Wiki site, a bug in Beaker 0.8.1 was discovered. Both the UI and API for creating an editable copy, fork, of a dat was only creating the folder structure and not copying the files. [https://github.com/beakerbrowser/beaker/issues/1265 github].

    There is an underlying issue with the plugin, in that I forgot to use `archive.download()` to ensure that the dat was fully downloaded before calling `.fork`. This will be resolved once the Beaker issue has been resolved.

    Resolving the `.fork()` has revealed an issue with the promise being resolved before `.fork()` has finished copying the contents of the template to the new wiki. A temporary fix of adding a delay seems to provide a temporary fix.
* Corrupted dat / loosing write access to the wiki's dat. [https://github.com/beakerbrowser/beaker/issues/1266 github]
